column4: ok I have am2 cpu with 8800gts video card...and can't get the nvidia drivers to work...any ideas?
I did the restricted format install...and the drivers from nvidia website and both times X will start start after reboot
I did the restricted format install...and the drivers from nvidia website and both times X will start start after reboot
works fine with my quadro on 7.10 (gutsy)
is there any editing I need to do after install?
not that I had to do
there are alot of tutorials on how to get them going.. have to install different packages, mainly the kernel headers
sudo apt-get install linux-headers-`uname -r` .. something like that
ok did that...and now no 3d at all
well I can't even get windows to install on my new system
ok did that...and now no 3d at all
like I said, mine just worked in Gutsy. I had issues in Feisty though
